Articles.Content:
I have made a station at a 200000 meter orbit above kerbin. I think it looks pretty cool, if anyone has any suggestions to make it better please suggest away.

Edited May 12, 2013 by sal_vager

Looks cool.

How about a ring more on the station, i think that will make it better!

Nice station.

What does the ring do?

If it's just for aesthetics, try giving it a purpose.

You could replace the ring for one with concealed docking ports to atatch other ships

also was that one launch or two docked together?

Yea it originally had docking ports on the end of the ring but decided i wanted to build it more long rather than sideways. And that is two ships put together just launched another right now and it looks pretty cool.
